wikipedia_page.main: Mahesh Verma is an Indian prosthodontist and the Director and Principal of Maulana Azad Institute of Dental Sciences. He is the Vice Chancellor of Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University. The Government of India awarded him, in 2014, with the Padma Shri, the fourth highest civilian award, for his contributions to the fields of medicine,

response: *Mahesh Verma –  Indian prosthodontist and the Director and Principal of Maulana Azad Institute of Dental Sciences
